boardgame.name: Nuclear War
boardgame.description: Satirical game in which each player represents a _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;major world power_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot; and attempts to gain global domination (or annihilation) through the strategic use of propaganda or nuclear weapons..._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Integrates with:_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Nuclear Proliferation_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Nuclear Escalation_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Weapons of Mass Destruction_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; India Rails (using Nuclear War Bonus Pack #2: Expansion to India Rails and Nuclear War)_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;The latest reprint of the game features new artwork on the cards and two new cards:_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Mars Probe (Secret): Take 1 million people from the discard pile._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Advanced Recycling (Special): Pick one used carrier or warhead from the discard pile._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;

result.value: Some necessary text - easily memorized or small crib sheet
Moderate in-game text - needs crib sheet or paste ups
Extensive use of text - massive conversion needed to be playable

listing.notes: condition of game parts : like new. condition of box : good +++++ my game is a newer edition (light blue box) +++++ will be shipped with insurance only +++++ payment for germany : personal pick up in berlin or bank transfer +++++ payment for usa and canada : paypal or cash (by letter, exchanged already into euros) or bank transfer +++++ payment for asia and australia: cash (by letter, exchanged already into euros) or bank transfer +++++ countries, that have no euro : cash (by letter, exchanged already into euros) or bank transfer +++++ payment for european countries, that have euro : cash (by letter) or bank transfer (wich is cost-free !) +++++ payment for european countries, that have no euro : cash (by letter, exchanged already into euros) or bank transfer +++++ for all : no checks ! +++++ foreign buyers beware : german postal sadly is very expensive for foreign packages (about 18 - 45 euros, it depends on, where the package has to be shipped), pleask at for prices, befor you buy !) +++++ shipping inside germany will cost 8 euros
Both Nuclear War _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; Nuclear Escalation in a single box. Cards are worn, but functionally fine. Player_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s copy.
This version is probably 20 years old. Box worn at corners and edges, contents are complete and good. Shipping within the UK included in price. Please contact for shipping to EU and Worldwide.
Played 3-4 times. Please contact me if you would like a quote on shipping cost or have a specific question regarding the game. I will only charge you for my actual shipping and packaging costs.

This game is brand new and manufacturer sealed. S_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;H is $7.50 via USPS Priority Mail to all 50 states. Combined shipping may be available on multiple purchases. Other shipping arrangements are available upon request but may vary in cost. Pennsylvania shipping addresses should include 6% sales tax. **VERY FAST SHIPPING - 2-4 business days once payment received**

Played several times - box worn but in good condition. Includes Escalation - all mixed together - but can supply both original boxes. Buyer to pay for Insurance (optional) but I won_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;t be held responsible for uninsured items that get lost in the post (haven_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;t lost one yet though). Game is complete and in excellent condition. Bank verified PayPal payments only please. $10.00 CONUS shipping. AK/HI and International buyers send geekmail for USPS cost. I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;m also selling the expansions to this game at $20 each. *SPECIAL OFFER. Nuclear was plus Proliferation and Escalation for only $50 plus $10 CONUS shipping.
I am selling Nuclear War, Nuclear Proliferation and a few dozen additional booster pack cards.

***This item is reserved for _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;msearle1_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039; from the Cici auction.*** Payment: Paypal to Cici Fischer Fund Money Order to Matthew Fischer _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;mfischer_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;

Flying Buffalo Inc. (FBI 6001) A comical cataclysmic card game for 2-6 players of all ages. A humorous confrontation between touchy world powers as each player attempts to sway his opponents_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039; populations with diplomacy, propaganda, and finally nuclear weaponry. Little old ladies defect in electric cars and the dread SUPERGERM spreads devastation! Takes about 10 minutes to learn and about 30 minutes to play. Invented by Doug Malewicki in 1965, this game has remained popular for over 40 years. Anyone who ever had to participate in a _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;civil defense drill_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; by hiding under his or her desk in grade school, or ever had a bomb shelter in the back yard should play this game. One of the few games where it is possible to have no winners (often everybody loses!). You have to play it to believe it. This game_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s a blast! It was chosen for Games Magazine_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;Games 100_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; for 1984. _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;The quintessential `beer-and-pretzels_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039; game: simple, fast, easy to learn, and loads of fun. Minimal prep time: shuffle the decks and deal._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; - Tim Kask, Adventure Gaming Magazine. (Boxed, 140 cards and spinner).

This sale is for Nuclear War 40th Anniversary Edition. This game is still in shrinkwrap and metal box has no dents, it is in superb condition. There were only 1000 of these made and each is numbered and signed. This sale is for number 309. Pictures of the game, showing condition, are available. Contact me for further questions about shipping and payment.

This bundle includes the components of: 1) Nuclear War 2) Nuclear Escalation 3) Nuclear Proliferation 4) Weapons of Mass Destruction 5) 15 Nuclear War Booster packs CARDS: The first 3 games have the original artwork. I bought my copy of Nuclear Escalation used, so the cards have noticeably more wear (browning on edges), but are undamaged and very playable. _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;War_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039; and _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;Proliferation_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039; cards have only been played a few times and are in good clean condition. _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;WMD_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039; and _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;Booster_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039; cards are unplayed and in excellent condition. Many _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;rare_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039; booster cards are included; email me if you want a list. OTHER COMPONENTS: Includes 2 _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;Nuclear Misfunction_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039; dice. The 9 country mats from Proliferation are included and are in good clean condition. Player mats from _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;Escalation_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039; are in worse shape, but redundant if you use the country mats. Spinner mat from the original game is included, but spinner parts are missing. Components are packed into boxes for _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;War_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039; and _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;Proliferation_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039; - _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;Escalation_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039; box has been discarded. Shipping will be via USPS Priority flat-rate, which is $9.85 to anywhere in the USA

New in Shrink. £3.70 postage to UK. I will ship worldwide (please ask, if outside the UK, for a shipping quote before ordering), combine orders for cheaper postage and will give a discount for purchases over £50. Please contact me for details. All items (over 500 unique games) I list are in stock and will be posted within 24 working hours of payment being received.
Includes the expansion Nuclear Proliferation! Played, but complete!!!
No credit cards please.
Very Good Condition. Complete. All pieces sorted, bagged, and itemized. Buyer pays for actual shipping costs. Will ship worldwide.

This is for 1st printing of Nuclear War from Flying Buffalo, 1965 edition on the box cover. Flying Buffalo_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s name doesn_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;t appear on the box or in the game materials, but based on the designer_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s website this small white box with a red mushroom cloud was released in 1972 version). From my research, I believe this the 1st printing of this edition by Flying Bufflow as this has a black box bottom and has rounded edge game cards. The cards are lightly played and in very good condition. Shipping is $5 to US, other locations please inquire.

Late 90_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s printing. Played a few times and still in VG condition. Box has some light shelf wear, slightly flaring sides and one split corner on the box top. The game also includes a (more than) complete set of the Nuclear War Booster Packs: Super Rare: Meteor Crater, Son of Supergerm, Vaccine, 200 Megatons, Doomsday Device (x2), Spy (lady), Mind Control, UFO Technology, Mole, Black Box, Spy (blonde guy) and Propaganda Boomerang. Rare: 13 Million Propaganda (x3), 75 Megatons (x4), Alternate Reality, Arms Sales, Back to Nature, Cyanide, Disinformation, Genetically Re-engineered Monsters, Health Care Policy, Killing Tomatoes, Marshall Plan, Mutual Disarmament, Nuclear Winter, Ozone Hole, Plutonium Fizzles, Psychic Hot Line, Radar Jamming, Spin Doctor, Spy (couple), Time Warp, World Cup Finals Uncommon: 7 Million Propaganda (x5), Domed Cities, Exchange Students, Faulty Fallout Shelter, Sexual Harassment, Solar Flare, Super Fallout Shelter, Talk Show Host, Virtual People. Common: 2 Million Propaganda (x8), 15 Megatons (x10), 40 Megatons (x7), Censorship, Delta Clipper (x8). Also included are the two special bonus cards: Advanced Recycling and Mars Probe; as well as a complete extra set of population cards.

Little old ladies defect in electric cars and the dread SUPERGERM spreads devastation! Takes about 10 minutes to learn and about 30 minutes to play. Invented by Doug Malewicki in 1965, this game has remained popular for over 40 years. Anyone who ever had to participate in a _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;civil defense drill_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; by hiding under his or her desk in grade school, or ever had a bomb shelter in the back yard should play this game. One of the few games where it is possible to have no winners (often everybody loses!). You have to play it to believe it. This game_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s a blast! It was chosen for Games Magazine_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;Games 100_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; for 1984. _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;The quintessential `beer-and-pretzels_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039; game: simple, fast, easy to learn, and loads of fun. Minimal prep time: shuffle the decks and deal._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; - Tim Kask, Adventure Gaming Magazine.

Box has light edge wear, mostly at the corners. Game components look almost new! This sale also includes the Nuclear Escalation game (in separate box). Both games are complete and all game components are in good condition. Comments: Condition Notes: Still in shrinkwrap. Shipping Notes: You are welcome to come to Community Game Night (see http://www.boardgamegeek.com/thread/127654) and pick up your game in person and pay $0.00 for shipping. Otherwise--Yes, I will gladly combine orders to reduce your per item shipping costs. (To see other items to add to your order see http://www.boardgamegeek.com/geekstore.php3?action=viewuser_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;username=RoamDog). Please provide a contact phone number--this is ONLY in case there are shipping issues--I am NOT planning to call you. Also, if you would like tracking information, also provide a direct/external (non-BGG) email address. Finally, if at all possible, please provide a business (rather than a residential) address and let me know that the address you are providing is a business address (this will expedite delivery). Payment Notes: US buyers: Preferred method of payment for all transactions is for me to receive a USPS money order from you (safest possible $$ transfer). A good alternative is for me to receive an Amazon gift certificate from you (see https://www.amazon.com/gp/gc/order-email?ie=UTF8_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;ref_=gc_lp_4ways_email_white -- fast -- easy -- no extra charge to you or me). Western Union transfer is also acceptable. If the receiver (you) elects to NOT pay extra for insurance (decision is totally up to the receiver) then the receiver agrees to assume responsibility for lost or damaged packages (I cannot remember ever having a problem, but the risk is there). Non-US buyers: Gift certificate from Amazon (see https://www.amazon.com/gp/gc/order-email?ie=UTF8_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;ref_=gc_lp_4ways_email_white) and Western Union wire transfer (see www.westernunion.com) are the only acceptable form of payment. Must be in US dollars and you pay any fees. Non-US buyers--Please also note that the shipping charge will be outrageously high. Probably high enough that it does not make sense to purchase this item from me. I have no control over this. Insurance will also be REQUIRED (at receiver_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s expense) for shipments to non-US addresses. Receivers outside the US must also agree to assume ALL responsibility for taxes, tariffs, customs duties, etc. If these terms are not acceptable, please do not order from me. **Note that the offered price is the discounted price for a cash (cash, money order, Amazon Gift Card, western union) payment. I do not really accept Paypal payments any more, but if you absolutely insist that Paypal is the only way that you can get the money to me, then please plan to pay an extra $0.50 plus and additional 5% of the total.
